name: Shaman King: Master of Spirits
summary: Shaman King: Master of Spirits is Metroidvania style platform-adventure video game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Japan and published by Konami. This is the first Shaman King game that was developed for the Game Boy Advance in America. It was developed to accompany the English dub by 4kids Entertainment.
info:
• 中文名: 通灵王：灵魂大师

  • 平台: GBA

  • 发行日期: 2004年11月9日
